text:
If you specify a file using <uptodate srcfile="X"> it must exist or an exception
is thrown. If, on the other hand, you specify that same file using a nested
<srcfiles> tag it ignores missing files silently.

Expected behavior: <srcfiles> should throw an exception if it matches no files.

That's how filesets work.

If you need a different behavior use srcresources with a nested filelist.
